content: To get there, head to the New Thunderclap Temple and pass through the entrance. Head straight ahead through the second building and take the stairs on the left. Keep heading left and into the red building on the side. Run up the stairs on the right, around the veranda, and up the stairs at the back to find yourself in the left-wing courtyard. Run up the stone stairs to find Non-Void waiting in the temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Void_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Void Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Non-Void Location'.
The content is as follows:
To get there, head to the New Thunderclap Temple and pass through the entrance. Head straight ahead through the second building and take the stairs on the left. Keep heading left and into the red building on the side. Run up the stairs on the right, around the veranda, and up the stairs at the back to find yourself in the left-wing courtyard. Run up the stone stairs to find Non-Void waiting in the temple.
